name: Hardcore Weapon Challenge - FPS Action
description: Hardcore Weapon Challenge is an ultimate weapon challenge game as you can understand from the title.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750 processor or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Must be 512 MB or more. DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 750 MB available space
